Alyosha Karamazov is the most connected figure (77 ties). Key relationship types: friend, spouse.

Key ties: Nikolai–Smurov (friend), Nina–Ilusha (sibling), Katerina–Ilusha (parent), Maria–Smurov (friend), +19 more

story_summary: Ilusha, seriously ill and bedridden, is comforted by visits from boys reconciled through Alyosha's efforts, though Krassotkin has refused to visit until now. Kolya Krassotkin arrives unexpectedly with a dog he claims is Ilusha's lost Zhutchka, which revives Ilusha's spirits, and he also presents Ilusha with a toy cannon that delights the family. The arrival of a new, important-looking doctor from Moscow is announced as the chapter ends.
evidence_quotes: Ilusha had not left his little bed under the ikons in the corner.
Krassotkin opened the door and came into the room.
